gs repo init

git checkout main

with-term $WORK/input.txt -- gs branch checkout feature
stderr 'feature: branch not tracked'
cmp stdout $WORK/golden/prompt.txt

gs ls -a
cmp stderr $WORK/golden/ls.txt
